name: Bound
description:
The younger brother of Crossed. Allows for full range of motion without weighing you down. Easy to put on, slide it over your head and put your arms through like you are putting on a t-shirt.  

Available in four sizes, according to your shirt size. 

Will not turn your clothes or skin green. 

Matte gunmetal brass rope chain. Durable. Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Suspended
description:
Suspenders brought into the 21st century. Easy to put on. Drape the chain behind your neck and fasten the clips to your pants. The suspenders are fully adjustable - hidden behind the neck and will not come undone. 

Reflective gunmetal brass curb chain. Will not turn your clothes or skin green. 

Suspenders are fully adjustable. One size fits all.

Handmade in Los Angeles, CA

name: Rung
description:
Designed for dancing & movement. Add some flare to your style. It can be worn with or without a shirt. Slides on easily over you head, arms through the openings. No hooks or clasps. Reversible. 

Industrial matte black brass curb chain and reflective silver rope chain. Will not turn your clothes or skin green.

Comes in 4 sizes, according to your shirt size. Durable. Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Tied
description:
An edgy alternative to your current tie collection. Can be worn with any button-down shirt. 

Made with reflective black nickel and gunmetal chain. Will not turn your neck or clothes green.

Tie length: 16".
Neck length: fully adjustable

Handmade in Los Angeles, California

name: Crossed
description:
Our most industrial body chain. Crossed is designed with your heaviest partying needs in mind. Allows full range of motion without weighing you down.

Durable reflective gunmetal curb chain. Will not turn your clothes or skin green. 

Comes in 4 sizes, according to your shirt size. Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Spun
description:
The introduction to men's body chains. This is a subtler version of Flown. Can be worn with or without a shirt. 

Slips on easily over your shoulders, no hooks or clasps. Will not fall off your shoulders. Durable gunmetal brass curb chain and silver rope chain. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Flown
description:
The ultimate festival or party piece. It can be worn with or without a shirt and it slips on easily over your shoulders. No hooks or clasps. 

Durable reflective gunmetal brass curb chain and matte brass rope chain. Will not turn your skin or clothes green. 

Available in 4 sizes, according to your shirt size. 
Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Hellen Earrings
description:
Wear a piece of Kenyan liberty. These limited edition earrings feature Kazuri beads hand made in Africa. For those of you who like your jewelry to tell a story.

The purchase of these earrings will feed 33 children lunch every day for an entire month. 

"Kazuri" means small and beautiful in Swahili. The beads support an empowered community of women in Kenya who are given fair and clean working conditions. 100% of the proceeds of these earrings will be donated to feed children in a community of refugees in Rongai, Kenya.

These earrings are named after a girl Lone Wolf Founder Molly Pearson developed a close relationship with on her trip to the refugee camp.

Available in Blue & Gold, Blue & Green, or Blue & Gunmetal. Please select color at checkout or we will send you Blue & Gunmetal. 

Also pictured: photos of the children your purchase will help support.

Assembled by hand in Los Angeles, California.

name: Irene Hand Chain
description:
Wear a piece of Kenyan liberty around your hand. This limited edition hand chain features a Kazuri bead handmade in Africa. For those of you who like your jewelry to tell a story.

The purchase of this hand chain will feed 25 children lunch every day for an entire month. 

The "Kazuri" beads, meaning small and beautiful in Swahili, are handmade by an empowered community of women in Kenya who are given fair and clean working conditions. 100% of the proceeds of this hand chain will be donated to feed children in a community of refugees in Rongai, Kenya.

This hand chain is named after the woman who makes it possible for 100% of your purchase to be donated towards supporting the children. 

Also pictured: children who will be supported by your purchase. 

Assembled by hand in Los Angeles, California.

description:
Wear a piece of Kenyan liberty around your hand. This limited edition hand chain features a Kazuri bead hand made in Africa. For those of you who like your jewelry to tell a story.

name: 18k Gold Clover Hand Chain
description:
It's a good luck charm for your whole hand. This four leaf clover hand chain is made from 18k plated gold. It is completely adjustable and fits small to large wrist sizes.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Silver Clover Hand Chain
description:
It's a good luck charm for your whole hand. This four leaf clover hand chain comes with sterling silver chain and plated rhodium charm. It is completely adjustable and fits small to large wrist sizes.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Cross Hand Chain
description:
This elegant hand chain is your ultimate layering piece. It slips over your middle finger and attaches with an adjustable clasp behind the wrist to ensure a perfect fit. 18k gold. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Black Crystal Clover Hand Chain
description:
Add some sparkle when you talk with your hands. This lucky lady hand chain is made from dainty, yet durable 18k gold chain. Completely adjustable.

24k gold pendant, 18k gold over silver chain.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Turquoise Crystal Clover Hand Chain
description:
Add some sparkle when you talk with your hands. This lucky lady hand chain is made from dainty, yet durable 18k gold chain. Completely adjustable.

24k gold pendant, 18k gold over silver chain. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Convertible Body Harness
description:
This rock and roll body harness slips on easily and can be worn in a myriad of ways. Suspenders, necklace or body armor. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Criss X Cross Halter Chain
description:
This amazing piece of jewelry can be worn two different ways. The halter body chain is one of a kind and adds instant intrigue to your outfit. Can be worn with a shirt or a dress.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Cleopatra Black and Gold Bust Necklace
description:
Fine reflective chain chain drapes beautifully over the body and adds a unique element to any outfit, wether it be a simple black dress, a bathing suit or an ornate print.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Secret Circle Infinity Body Chain
description:
This simple body chain can be worn in multiple different ways. Great for day to night outfits. 

Available in Gold or Silver.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Elegant Body Chain Ladder Necklace
description:
This stunning silver ladder is an attention getter, and will get you compliments and head turns everywhere you wear it. Looks stunning on a plain black tee, or dresses up any outfit. You can wear it as a body chain or a necklace. 

Please specify your dress size at checkout

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Brenna Leg Chain
description:
This eye-catching garter belt adds an undeniably sexy element to any outfit. Pairs equally well with little black dresses, mini skirts, shorts, and hot summer nights outfits. The vertical chain in front and back gives you legs for days. Garter is secured by one alligator clip in front and one in back, for a comfy and strong fit.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Gold Infinity Knotted Hand Chain
description:
This simple hand chain is the perfect accessory for layering. Try it with a few knuckle rings and gladiator sandals. 

The high quality chain makes this a strong and long lasting accessory. It will not turn green on your hand!

Adjustable, one size fits most. Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Golden Pyramid Hand Chain
description:
This rockin' hand chain slips over your ring finger and clasps behind the wrist to allow for a flexible and comfortable fit that won't fall off your hand. 

Pendant is 14k gold plated over brass. With proper care it will not turn or discolor. 

Beach photos show the design detail.

Solid gold option is available, email CustomerCare@lonewolfaccents.com for pricing.

Adjustable, one size fits most. Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Daphne Head Chain
description:
Feeling bohemian? Feeling powerful? Want to spice up your favorite summer outfit? This head piece takes any outfit to the next level, and easily transitions from summer to fall. 

This headdress is like a gold halo of awesome. 

Made with Limited Vintage Chain

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: ADD RUSH SHIPPING - 2 DAY
description:
Add this to your cart if you'd like to upgrade to two-day shipping.
This is for domestic orders ONLY.

email customercare@lonewolfaccents.com if you have questions about rush shipping

name: Brass Leg Chain
description:
This sexy leg chain is the perfect accessory to a day or night outfit.

This bronze chain should be worn under shorts, a dress or a skirt. It attaches with super strong flat-front alligator clip that attach in the front and back to keep it super secured to your leg.

The photos show how it attaches to your underwear and how it should look worn properly under your clothes.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Renaissance Head Chain
description:
This beautiful Renaissance inspired head chain is made with vintage chain and a green or brick colored pendant.  Limited supply due to vintage chain.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Two-Tone Garter Belt/ Leg Chain
description:
This leg chain/garter belt adds an undeniably sexy element to any outfit. 

Pairs equally well with little black dresses, mini skirts and shorts. This leg chain uses flat fronted alligator clips to secure the chain in place. This allows you to move and groove without worrying about the chain slipping or showing through your clothing.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Pyramid Love Body Chain
description:
Bring out your inner free love hippie with this chain and a long flowing dress. Or sneak it under a blazer for clean look. 

This gold pyramid body chain clasps around the neck and slips on easily. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Celestial Summer Belly Chain
description:
Give some glam to your tan. This belly chain is hand made from high quality silver chain and an adorable stack of beads at the end of the tassels. 

We love it on red bikinis and black swim suits! 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Empress Body Chain
description:
Feminine and sexy easy to wear body chain slips on easily over your body and has an optional-use clasp around the neck. 

Let it transform your little black dress or pair it with a bandeau and maxi skirt for a flirty summer look. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Swarovski Hand Chain
description:
It's like wearing sunshine on your hand. This Swarovski crystal and sterling silver hand chain will make you sparkle all day long. A great alternative or addition to your ring collection. Fully adjustable. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: One-of-a-Kind Green Goddess Headchain
description:
This amazing headpiece is one-of-a-kind...Literally - this is the only one! Made with a beautiful green pendant and gold and black chain, this is the ultimate statement to any outfit.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Byzantine Head Chain
description:
Evoke your favorite warrior goddess with one of our most popular head chains. 

For the days you want to be the most gorgeous woman in the room, or when you just want a little something extra, this beautiful silver head chain makes you feel fearless and powerful.  

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

This item is currently in production, once you purchase we will be able to ship out in mid-February. We'll notify you via email.

name: Athena Hand Chain
description:
Are you a warrior goddess? Of course you are. Be a show stopper with this rockin hand chain that no one else in the room will be wearing. 

We think it looks great with everything in your closet, but especially love it with a sheer white top. 

Adjustable, one size fits most. Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Athena Head Chain
description:
This beautiful headpiece can be worn in association to any era- Elizabethan, Victorian, Roman or Greek. Easy to wear and feels weightless. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

name: Golden Summer Head Chain
description:
This beautiful head chain adds a sophisticated yet bohemian flare to any ensemble. Made from beautiful two-toned gold and black chain, this piece sparkles in the sunlight and the adjustable back allows you to wear it with your hair up or down.

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.

See the INFO > FAQ section for all sizing questions & shipping information

name: Zodiac Summer Belly Chain
description:
We love this belly chain and know you will, too. Why? Because the gold chain is awesome, feathers are always a good idea, and each one is customized to your astrological sign. 

Show off your sexy Scorpio self or your artistic Aquarius aura. 

Handmade in Los Angeles, California.
S/M fits 0-4
M/L fits 6-8
